name: Super Painter
overview: Trapped in a colorless world, armed with a paintbrush - there’s only one thing to do! As Super Painter, you’ll have to fill in all the missing color from the walls and ledges of 25 charming stages. Watch out for enemies and pits to the bottom, and don’t box yourself in - when you’re done painting, you’ll have to race to the magic door to the next level. It’s platform puzzling at its finest!
